mapper.insert: INSERT INTO apply (apply_no, adopt_no, id, phone, job, addr, mate, mate_agree, raise, currently, plan, pay, reason, situation, reg_date) VALUES ( seq_apply_apply_no.nextval, #{adoptNo}, #{id}, #{phone}, #{job}, #{addr}, #{mate}, #{mateAgree}, #{raise}, #{currently}, #{plan}, #{pay}, #{reason}, #{situation}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT apply_no, adopt_no, id, phone, job, addr, mate, mate_agree, raise, currently, plan, pay, reason, situation, reg_date, status_code FROM apply WHERE apply_no = #{value}
